column4: Can anyone offer any sort of idea of why external harddisk cause problems in ubuntu 7.04?????
can anyone tell me anything about problems unmounting external units in ubuntu
It would help if we knew what the problem was. I mean, did it catch on fire or what?
the problem is that when I want to unmount it simply shows up a pop up saying that something has to be written
Not an error I've seen before. Try dismounting it from the terminal?
I'd try 'sudo unmount /dev/device' then. It might give you a more useful error.
it says an app is using the hdd
run 'sudo lsof /dev/device' and it should tell you which
One thing you could try it just pulling it out. If you didn't edit anything, there shouldn't be any problems. :p
But that's not very good advise.
Im sorry for my girlfriend but Im definitely coming back to debian 3...
Well, I have to admit that I've not run into mtab.
